name: h3
description: Elevate your game with the 2026 DeMarini Zen Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat, a powerhouse in the Zen series designed for young athletes seeking superior performance. With its balanced swing feel, the bat features a 2-piece composite construction and a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, providing an optimal blend of power and control. The updated Dark Matter Composite Barrel maximizes the sweet spot, ensuring every hit delivers impressive distance and precision. Equipped with the Zedn Direct Connection, this bat offers a more forgiving feel, while the Anomaly End Cap reduces swing weight for enhanced barrel performance and control. Certified with the USSSA 1.15 BPF, this bat is ready to make an impact on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
